summary: The diff shows only modifications to project_state.json metadata file. No implementation evidence found for any of the 7 requirements (REQ-67 through REQ-73). The diff appears to be truncated metadata tracking existing features (REQ-1 through REQ-6), but contains no code changes for backend historical backfill, holder tracking, balance queries, timer fixes, error handling, or frontend holder display components.

missing_requirements.requirement: Implement robust historical backfill in backend that fetches ALL transactions from ledger canister using ICRC-2 standard with batch processing
missing_requirements.reason: No backend code changes visible in diff. Only project_state.json metadata was modified. No evidence of icrc3_get_blocks implementation, batch processing logic, or stable memory storage for transactions.

missing_requirements.requirement: Build comprehensive holder tracking system in backend that analyzes transactions to identify 344 holders by tracking transfer events and filtering zero balances
missing_requirements.reason: No backend implementation found. Diff contains only metadata changes. No holder tracking logic, transaction analysis code, or address extraction from transfer events is present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Query live balances for each holder using ICRC-2 icrc1_balance_of method with batch processing for 344+ addresses
missing_requirements.reason: No backend code implementing balance queries visible. Only project_state.json modified. No icrc1_balance_of calls, batch query logic, or zero balance filtering code present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Calculate and store percentage of total supply (999,999,999.92M BITTYICP) for each holder in stable memory with address, balance, and percentage data
missing_requirements.reason: No implementation of holder data structure, percentage calculations, or stable memory storage visible in diff. Only metadata file was changed.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix existing 5-minute polling timer for incremental holder updates using transaction index tracking without re-scanning entire ledger
missing_requirements.reason: No timer implementation or modifications found. Diff shows only project_state.json changes. No polling logic, incremental update mechanism, or transaction index tracking present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add comprehensive error handling and logging throughout backend indexing system with progress tracking and status query endpoint
missing_requirements.reason: No error handling, logging, or status query implementation visible. Only metadata file modified. No error messages, progress logs, or indexing status endpoints present.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update frontend HolderList component and useHolderData hook to display 344 holders with addresses, balances, and percentages
missing_requirements.reason: No frontend component or hook modifications found in diff. Only project_state.json changed. No HolderList updates, useHolderData hook changes, or holder display table implementation present.
